channel.title: How to copy codes from RSCA to RSCD?
channel.description: I just want to know how you copy codes from RSCA to RSCD. For example, you can't use charge on RSCD, so I want to transfer the spellhandlers and spells.rscd, etc. from RSCA to RSCD. I tried messing around for about an hour but to no avail.

item.title: How to copy codes from RSCA to RSCD?
item.dc:creator: @A_Gh0st A Gh0st
item.description:
@A_Gh0st wrote:

Well someone from these forums suggested me try but Idk how. And I’m sure most of these people have done it themselves.

Read full topic
item.source: How to copy codes from RSCA to RSCD?
